front.title: TACACS+ Security, TLS, and SSH Public Keys

abstract.t: The TACACS+ Protocol [RFC8907] provides device administration for routers, network access servers and other networked computing devices via one or more centralized servers. This document, a companion to the TACACS+ protocol [RFC8907], adds new packet formats to improve security and function, Transport Layer Security (currently defined by TLS 1.3 [RFC8446]) support, and support for SSH [RFC4716] public keys and deprecates former inferior security mechanisms.
